name: The Facility (itch) (Neighbourhood Snake)
description:
This is a single adventure module for a table top rpg called "Stryx". Unfortunately, whilst this module is made solely by me, the Stryx main world-book was made by a small team, and so I don't have sole rights to release it.

As such, for now this book is not super usable, but is still hopefully interesting. If anyone would like a copy of the Stryx main book, please feel free to contact me and I'll talk to the rest of the team.
